front.title: Preparation and Comparison of Internationalized Strings Representing Simple User Names and User Secrets

abstract.t: This document describes how to handle Unicode strings representing simple user names and user secrets, primarily for purposes of comparison. This profile is intended to be used by Simple Authentication and Security Layer (SASL) mechanisms (such as PLAIN and SCRAM-SHA-1), as well as other protocols that exchange simple user names or user secrets. This document obsoletes RFC 4013.
